Summary: My son and I saw UFO come over us, stoped then took off straight up.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Venice
There were no other sightings in Venice on or around February 7th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailssaw about 6 ufos out of are atmosphere 2 went south west 3 went west 1 went north...then one that ive seen low to the ground several times almost came over me and my son with looked like a round yellowish lght..then stoped a different light came on looked light a firey throust then took off going up almost were you cant even see it..also ive notice more stars out lately bout they also seem to sway but stay in same position...always between 6 am and 640 am.. cant get video to dark and not a good enough camera
